document.discussion_title: Sons of Italy Lodge holds Spring Fling Dinner Dance May 7 in Lynn
document.topic_text: Sons of Italy Lodge holds Spring Fling Dinner Dance May 7 in Lynn Comment Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 12:41 PM Updated at 12:41 PM Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 12:41 PM LYNN The Santa Famiglia Lodge, Sons of Italy, will sponsor a Spring Fling Dinner Dance on Saturday, May 7, from 6:30 to 10:30 p.m. at Holy Family Church Hall, 26 Bessom St., Lynn. An authentic Italian dinner with dancing to the music of the North Shore’s own DJ/entertainer Alan Labella will be featured. BYO. Those attending must be 21 or older Tickets are $23 per person. Make reservations by calling Bill Travascio at 978-973-3951. All proceeds benefit the lodge’s charitable activities. North of Boston
